items.name: Hardware Development and Fabrication
items.description: Development of a custom creative interface for Nouns DAO and the construction of a Nouns-sponsored Matr Labs rack

items.name: Summer Development
items.description: Use community Nouns as test materials during the summer development process

items.name: Launch Token-gated Nouns website
items.description: Officially launch the token-gated Nouns website for the community to start generating works

description: Our proposal aims to MATR 1,001 Nouns and distribute them globally to their respective holders. Each Noun-holding wallet will be airdropped a Matr Labs token that can be redeemed for a physical. We will update the metadata of the token upon redemption with a hi-res image of the Matr'd Noun, which will provide a digital Certificate of Authenticity for each physical piece of art. We will promote this effort through social channels and allocate secondary royalties of the Matr Labs x Nouns token to the Nouns treasury.

project.name: Matr Labs Platform
project.description: Newly developed art-making software and scaled-down versions of large machines.

title: Artmatr x Nouns - 1,001 Nouns
